briefTitle: Piroxicam and Levonorgestrel Co-treatment for Emergency Contraception
officialTitle: Piroxicam and Levonorgestrel Co-treatment for Emergency Contraception: Randomised Controlled Trial
summary: This is a randomised controlled trial aimed at comparing the efficacy of levonorgestrel (LNG) co-administered with piroxicam or placebo for oral emergency contraception (EC). Piroxicam is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) commonly used as a pain-killer in inflammatory conditions. Efficacy will be measured as the percentage of pregnancies prevented.
